name: signal-relay-mcp
description: Connect AI agents to SocioLogic's synthetic persona platform. Interview realistic customer personas, run multi-persona research campaigns, and export board-ready reports through natural conversation.

tools.name: sociologic_list_personas
tools.description: List synthetic personas from marketplace or private collection

tools.name: sociologic_get_persona
tools.description: Get detailed persona information (demographics, psychographics, traits)

tools.name: sociologic_create_persona
tools.description: Generate a new persona from natural language description

tools.name: sociologic_interview_persona
tools.description: Conduct adversarial interview with a persona

tools.name: sociologic_get_persona_memories
tools.description: Retrieve persona's semantic memories via vector search

tools.name: sociologic_list_campaigns
tools.description: List research campaigns with status and results

tools.name: sociologic_get_campaign
tools.description: Get campaign details including interviews and findings

tools.name: sociologic_create_campaign
tools.description: Create multi-persona research campaign with custom questions

tools.name: sociologic_export_campaign
tools.description: Export campaign results as PDF or JSON

tools.name: sociologic_list_focus_groups
tools.description: List focus groups for cohort-based research

tools.name: sociologic_get_focus_group
tools.description: Get focus group details with member personas

tools.name: sociologic_create_focus_group
tools.description: Create new focus group to organize personas

tools.name: sociologic_add_personas_to_focus_group
tools.description: Add personas to an existing focus group

tools.name: sociologic_get_credits_balance
tools.description: Check current credits balance and usage
